channel.title: Comments for page "Hunt The Sandfurry!"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Hunt The Sandfurry!"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It seems that there's actually two copies of this mission(with the same stats). The only difference is in the capitalization of the mission text: "SandFurries roam the desert," and "Sandfurries roam the desert,". Of course, that means it would appear to show up twice as often as other missions.
